derivation: or שָׁלֵיו; feminine שְׁלֵוָה; from H7951 (שָׁלָה);
outline:
1. quiet, at ease, prosperous
    1. at ease (of persons)
    2. quiet (of land)
    3. quiet, ease
    4. ease (subst)
kjv_def: (being) at ease, peaceable, (in) prosper(-ity), quiet(-ness), wealthy.
strongs_def: tranquil; (in a bad sense) careless; abstractly, security
